Actions.Name: Thrash
Actions.Effects: Foe must save or be stunned. Can be made from the head or tail.

Actions.Name: Spiny Body
Actions.Description: All foes adjacent to the Gigantapede take 2 damage.

Actions.Name: Acid Spray
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters inside must save or take [fray] damage 3 times, or once on a successful save.
Actions.Effects: Can only be made from the head.

Actions.Name: Stinger
Actions.Description: A character adjacent to the Gigantapede's tail must save or take [D]+[fray] and be marked.
Actions.Mark: While marked, they are poisoned, burning, dazed+, and shoved 2 in a direction of the Gigantapede's choice at the start of their turn. A character can end this mark by hitting the Gigantapede with an attack.

Actions.Name: Burrow
Actions.Description: All characters adjacent to the Gigantapede are shoved 1, then remove it from the battlefield. It's head then resurfaces in a new space in range 5. Place its body in any configuration.
